summary: Eurydice is a two handed battle mage located at the Old Hroldan Inn. She is available as either a Calculated level 45 or an Auto-Level character. She can be married and is set to either essential or non-essential. All versions are compatible with ADEC, UNPB and CBBE with BBP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1340985253.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[b][size= 4][color= mediumseagreen]My initial plan was to simply make Eurydice a Wood Nymph that was more of a spouse than a combat companion. I kept playing with her settings and here we are, now she is a fairly strong Battle Mage that prefers light armor. To make things a little different she wields two handed swords, axes and spears with extreme prejudice. I will say that she has fast become one of my favorite companions as far as physical beauty and skills are concerned. I had also designed her to appear more natural (lighter makeup) and also to roam around topless but lack of topless armors here on the Nexus became an issue as far as conveying my plan in my screen shots (Oddly enough there are more topless UNP armors than CBBE armors). She is located at the Old Hroldan Inn south of Markarth and north west of Rorikstead.[/b][/size][/color]

[size= 4][b][color= red]Updated 07/19/12: I added two Essential versions and all files are now at 50% scaled weight so they are compatible with most bodies available.[/b][/color][/size]
 
[b][size= 2][color= ghostwhite]
Race: Breton
Hair: Light Blonde
Eyes: Dark Blue
Weight: 120
Height: 5\'2\" to 5\'4\"
Location: Old Hroldan Inn
Required File:
Hair: Apachii Version 1.3

Optional Files: To make her look like she does in my images
Eyes: Natural Eyes by Nevenbridge: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589  
I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and No Shine (some pics) on her in combination with pretty lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167
Darker Feminine Brows by Caliente (CBBE) 
Dirt to Beauty Marks (CBBE)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Pretty Lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 with Navetseas body \"Feminine Arms and Toned Abs\" textures. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer) (GlossTech V5 \"No Shine\" used in some pics)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

She is wearing a mashup I created of Mak\'s Remodeled CBBE Armor and Vanilla kit. This was done by using the console to add the various armor pieces to her inventory. Type in console: help arms, pauldron, belt, bikini etc... (She will appear nude in your game!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
17 Craftable Pantys for CBBEv3M by goTha
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16837
 Expanded Jewelry Crafting by lautasantenni
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361
Her weapon shown in my screenies is Bob\'s Armory\'s Aegolas Spear, which is wielded more like a battleaxe. I found it perfect for Eurydice since she is fairly petite and slender. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12060[/b][/size][/color] 

[B][COLOR=RED]***ApachiiSkyHair 1.3 is REQUIRED!***[/B][/COLOR]

[b]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b]
author: FalmerBane
